product_name: Imagine Surf Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard - 12'
long_description: A board for fitness, family fun or weekend adventures on local surf, the 12 ft. Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard from Imagine Surf offers a smooth compromise between surf and flatwater performance.
short_description: A board for fitness, family fun or weekend adventures on local surf, the 12 ft. Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard from Imagine Surf offers a smooth compromise between surf and flatwater performance.
